Visium mouse colon dataset

mcolon_dataset.Rd

A Visium dataset obtained from a "swiss roll" of a mouse colon

  • mousecolon/filtered_feature_bc_matrix.h5:
    light weight gene expression matrix with 188 genes in hdf5 format filtered to include spots under the tissue

  • mousecolon/spatial/tissue_lowres_image.jpg:
    H&E image (600x541) pixels

  • mousecolon/spatial/tissue_positions_list.csv:
    CSV file with spot coordinates

  • mousecolon/spatial/scalefactors_json.json:
    JSON file with scalefactors

  • mousecolon/se_mcolon:
    Seurat object stored as an .Rds file with the top 100 most variable features

  • mousecolon/galt_spots.csv:
    CSV file with GALT spot barcodes

References

doi:10.1038/s41467-022-28497-0

See also

Other datasets: mbrain_dataset
